sourcesContent:
<template>
  <swiper
      :slides-per-view="3"
      style="width: 65vw !important;margin-top: 8vh !important;"
      :loop="false"
      :direction="'horizontal'"
      ref="mySwiper"
  >
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Heavy metal" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Nu metal" file-name="mick_thompson_guitar.png" color="white"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Metalcore" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Rapcore" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Groove Metal" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Orchestral metal" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
  </swiper>
</template>

<script>
import Slide from "./Slide.vue";
import {Swiper, SwiperSlide, SwiperCore} from "swiper-vue2";
import 'swiper/swiper-bundle.css';
import { Pagination, Mousewheel, Keyboard } from 'swiper';
import {Swiper as sw} from "swiper";
SwiperCore.use([Pagination, Mousewheel, Keyboard]);

export default {
  name: "TheSlideGroup",
  components: {
    Slide,
    Swiper,
    SwiperSlide
  },
  data: () => ({
    model: null,
    swiper: null
  }),
  mounted() {
    console.log("ssssssssss");
    this.swiper = new sw(this.$refs.mySwiper, {
      on: {
        init: function () {
          console.log('swiper initialized');
        },
      }});
    this.swiper.nextSlide();
  },
    /*setTimeout(() => {
      this.swiper.autoplay.start();
      setTimeout(() => this.swiper.autoplay.stop(), 1000);
    },
        3000);*/
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
